effects.display_string:
Set: Your abilities have a chance to begin a Winning Streak!, increasing the damage of Overpower by 5%, stacking up to 10 times. 
Overpower has a 15% chance to end your Winning Streak!
Set: When your Winning Streak! ends you gain 2% Haste and your Mortal Strike and Cleave damage is increased by 2% per stack of Winning Streak! you had for 12 sec.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

spells.description:
Equip: When you enter combat, gain 1 Dormant Gemstone per socketed gem.

Whenever you heal an ally, bestow upon them 1 Empowered Gemstone to increase the potency of one of their socketed gems by 141 for 20 sec. When their gemstone becomes dormant, it is returned to you.

spells.description:
Use: Channel to vent flames for 2 sec, dealing 2.5 million Fire damage split between all nearby enemies.

Mechanical enemies become Superheated, taking 119,718  additional Fire damage when struck by your next harmful ability. (2 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Your abilities have a chance to call the Darkness to you, increasing your Strength by 2,355, up to 11,776.

Upon reaching full power, the Darkness is unleashed, inflicting 2.5 million Shadow damage split between nearby enemies over 15 sec before fading back into the remnant.

Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Jaithys, the Prison Blade
